title: Coronavirus update: China to close borders in bid to stop reinfection
description: As coronavirus continues to spread globally, China and Europe have taken the lead from other countries and are closing their borders to foreigners to halt the spread.
content:
Updated 
March 27, 2020 05:25:50
As China records fewer new cases of coronavirus, it's temporarily shutting itself to all foreigners from Saturday to halt further spread of the virus. 
This comes as G20 leaders, including Prime Minister Scott Morrison, joi… [+7166 chars]
